title: Expense Tracker
description: Developed a user-friendly expense tracker application that allows users to manage their finances effectively.

title: To-Do List
description: Created a simple To-Do List app that lets users add and delete tasks, with local storage for data persistence and an intuitive user interface.

title: Anime List (Api Calling)
description: The Anime List component dynamically fetches and displays a collection of anime titles using the Jikan API.
